    • Method Detail

      • createNewUser

        public static void createNewUser(java.lang.String userName)
        Creates a new PreferenceModel, saves the model to the file system and updates the appropriate views.

      • setUserInitialRun

        public void setUserInitialRun()
        Sets the open user by checking if one exists on the file system, or creating a new user.

      • updateLocationModel

        public static void updateLocationModel(LocationModel location)
        Update the location of the user or cache the coordinates if no user exists.

        Since the AlertView to create UserModel runs on the UI thread, it is possible that no UserModel exists. Therefore, setting the location is wrapped in a try/catch block and the location is cached.

        Parameters:
        location - of the phone

      • getContext

        public android.content.Context getContext()

      • setContext

        public void setContext(android.content.Context context)

      • getUser

        public PreferenceModel getUser()

      • setUser

        public static void setUser(PreferenceModel user)
        Create a new user.

        Since GPS updates are infrequent, the users location is set to the current cached location until a new signal is received.

        Parameters:
        user - New user associated with the application.

      • saveOpenUser

        public void saveOpenUser()
        Save the user to the fileystem and return the user that was saved
